\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.ioc.declaration.trace.active}
\label{configuration:AmbethIocDeclarationTraceActive}
\ClearAPI
Defines whether IoC classes (especially beans and properties) should save the stack trace of their declaration. If set to true the classes store a compact form of the stack trace during constructor invocation in a property, mostly called \textit{declarationStackTrace}. Valid values are "true" and "false".\\
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE - DO NOT EDIT
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{com.koch.ambeth.config.IocConfigurationConstants.TrackDeclarationTrace}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{ambeth.ioc.declaration.trace.active}}]
ambeth.ioc.declaration.trace.active=true
\end{lstlisting}
